title: Small Duck Climbing Stairs Toy DIY Racing Track Toy Music Duck Roller Coaster(random color)
description:
Description: Item name: Electric Duck Climbing Stairs Toy Battery: 2 x AA batteries (not included) Number of ducks: 7pcs Recommended age: 3 years old or above

weight ; 264 grams
Package Included: 1 Set Electric Duck Climbing Stairs Toy

Features: 1. Safe Material: Made of ABS, the toy is non-toxic, eco-friendly, safe and durable. All parts are round and smooth without any sharp edge, which is safe for children. 2. Easy to Install and Carry: It is not large and can be taken anywhere after disassembly. It can be taken indoors, to gardens, beaches and queues. After being assembled in order, kids can start playing. 3. Unique Design: The toy set comes with flashing LED lights, and it is easy to assemble. The cute little yellow ducks can climb stairs and slide tracks. The toy contains interesting tracks and cheerful music (with on/off button). 4. Promote Baby's Development: Interesting songs and cheerful music can develop babies? visual perception, to help them recognize colors and help young children develop hand-eye coordination. 5. Perfect Gift: This is the perfect gift for the beginning of school season, Halloween, birthday or Christmas for kids.
